description: Lists geofences stored in a given geofence collection.

parameters.name: CollectionName
parameters.description: The name of the geofence collection storing the list of geofences.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token specifying which page of results to return in the response. If no token is provided, the default page is the first page. Default value: null.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: An optional limit for the number of geofences returned in a single call. Default value: 100

nested_items.name: Entries
nested_items.description: Contains a list of geofences stored in the geofence collection.

nested_items.name: GeofenceId
nested_items.description: The geofence identifier.

nested_items.name: Polygon
nested_items.description: A polygon is a list of linear rings which are each made up of a list of vertices.
(list) ---
(list) ---
(float) ---

nested_items.name: Center
nested_items.description: A single point geometry, specifying the center of the circle, using WGS 84 coordinates, in the form [longitude, latitude].
(float) ---

nested_items.name: Radius
nested_items.description: The radius of the circle in meters. Must be greater than zero and no larger than 100,000 (100 kilometers).

nested_items.name: Geobuf
nested_items.description: Geobuf is a compact binary encoding for geographic data that provides lossless compression of GeoJSON polygons. The Geobuf must be Base64-encoded.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Identifies the state of the geofence. A geofence will hold one of the following states:
ACTIVE -- The geofence has been indexed by the system.
PENDING -- The geofence is being processed by the system.
FAILED -- The geofence failed to be indexed by the system.
DELETED -- The geofence has been deleted from the system index.
DELETING -- The geofence is being deleted from the system index.

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the geofence was stored in a geofence collection in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

nested_items.name: UpdateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the geofence was last updated in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

nested_items.name: GeofenceProperties
nested_items.description: User defined properties of the geofence. A property is a key-value pair stored with the geofence and added to any geofence event triggered with that geofence.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token indicating there are additional pages available. You can use the token in a following request to fetch the next set of results.
